Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he holds and loses before his poignant death, the battles he must overcome in order to become an artist, and his efforts to spread his art through youth literature and theater.
